entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
